name: TheJazzPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open The Jazz Podcast”
”Alexa, start The Jazz Podcast”
”Alexa, ask The Jazz Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the jazz podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Jazz Podcast is run by professional musicians based in London. We like life stories and inspirational tales of why other musicians get into the business. We also run a series of album and jazz festival preview shows, which can also be found in amongst the list here. All of our guests are in some way connected to the jazz scene in the U.K.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask The Jazz Podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask The Jazz Podcast to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
